name: Ancient Tunnel
description: A hidden passage beneath the sand. Move to any other tunnel tile on your turn.

name: Hidden Passage
description: A secret underground route. Travel to any other tunnel tile as a single action.

name: Secret Tunnel
description: A concealed subterranean path. Instantly move to another tunnel tile once per turn.
Ancient markings point east and west. Reveals the column where the engine part is located.
Hieroglyphs indicate north and south. Shows the row containing the engine part.
Wind-worn etchings stretch left to right. Indicates the column of the propeller part.
Vertical symbols of flight. Reveals the row where the propeller part is hidden.
Shimmering lines across the tile. Shows the column containing the crystal part.
Glowing marks from top to bottom. Indicates the row where the crystal part lies.
Compass-like symbols pointing east-west. Reveals the column of the navigation part.
Star-chart markings running north-south. Shows the row containing the navigation part.

name: Ancient Marketplace
description: Remnants of a bustling bazaar. Gain a random equipment card when you land here.

name: Oasis
description: A lush haven in the desert. Receive a water carrier or solar shield equipment.

name: Mirage
description: Shimmering illusions in the heat. Gain a dune blaster or time throttle equipment.

name: Dune
description: A massive sand hill. Obtain a secret water reserve or jet pack equipment.

name: Sandstorm
description: Swirling sands reveal hidden treasures. Receive a random advanced equipment card.

name: Desert Cave
description: A cool, shadowy grotto. Gain a terrascope or desert explorer kit equipment.

name: Forgotten Ruins
description: Crumbling structures of an ancient civilization. Obtain an archaeologist's tools or sand goggles equipment.

name: Shifting Sands
description: Ever-changing dunes conceal secrets. Receive a dune skipper or mirage mapper equipment.

name: Ancient Statue
description: A weathered monument to forgotten gods. Gain a sandstorm suppressor or ancient amulet equipment.

name: Quicksand
description: Treacherous sinking sands. Obtain a hover boots or sand anchor equipment to escape.

name: Palm Trees Well
description: A true oasis with fresh water. Each player can collect up to 2 water when here.

name: Stone Well
description: An ancient well still brimming with water. Players may collect up to 2 water each.

name: Mirage Well
description: A deceptive illusion of water. No water can be collected here, beware of wasted actions!
